name: Medieval Mayhem [Level 6/Group 3]
description:
Medieval Mayhem

A local multiplayer, competitive turn based game packed with over the top physics action and destruction.

Players take it in turns to defend their castle by arranging a series of platforms, once both players defences have been built - mayhem ensues as a cannon falls from the sky and fires a cannon ball in a random direction. The last castle standing wins.

Developers

  • Ben Reynolds
  • James Pyke

Credits

Soundtrack: Adrian von Ziegler
Artwork: Vecteezy
